title: I dreamed that I was promoted to lieutenant in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I was promoted to lieutenant in a dream, and seeing a promotion can have many meanings, so we know what it has. I dreamed that I was promoted to lieutenant in a dream. I dreamed that I was promoted to lieutenant in a dream, it could be an achievement, and God knows best. If a married man sees that he is promoted to The rank of lieutenant in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a promotion in a dream, this may indicate blessings, God willing. If a married woman sees a promotion in a dream, this may mean that she has reached a high position and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. She dreamed That I washed with water in a dream. I dreamed that I washed with water in a dream, which may lead to getting rid of problems and worries, God willing. If a married woman sees herself washing her mouth in a dream, this may be evidence of her freedom from problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl rinsing your mouth In a dream, this may indicate relief from distress, and God is All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees herself rinsing her mouth to wash herself in a dream, this may be a sign that she will be able to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was walking in London in a dream, and we did not find specific explanations for seeing that. However, seeing muscles in a dream can be evidence of the strength of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of seeing a preacher in a dream: a good cleric in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a preacher in a dream according to Muhammad Ibn Sirin in detail. Preachers, clerics, and sheikhs of righteous Muslim men represent lamps of light that guide people to the path of truth and justice in the world, so that Muslims can do so. I find happiness through worship in this world and obtain the best reward through bliss in the afterlife. Seeing them always brings comfort and reassurance to the soul, and you find eloquence and piety in their words, but what about the interpretation of seeing them in a dream? What is the interpretation of seeing them in reality? This is what we will learn with you about the interpretation of seeing a preacher in a dream in the next article from the encyclopedia, so follow us. The preacher in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin explained in his book (Explanation of Great Dreams) that seeing sheikhs, preachers, and clerics is one of the praiseworthy visions in a dream, which foretells the dreamer a high status and status in this world. Because he is a good man. He maintains the performance of worship and stops what the Almighty God has forbidden to us. It is also a good vision that indicates that the dreamer seeks to learn knowledge directly and benefit from it and benefit the people around him. Whoever sees in a dream a religious man in one of the places whose people are suffering from misfortunes and troubles, then his vision will be A good glimpse of the end of misfortunes and the disappearance of the worries of the people of that place. Seeing clerics in a dream means that the dreamer will grant him a lot of goodness or that he will obtain a great status and position in the world, so his conditions in this world will improve greatly, which he did not expect. According to Interpretations: Seeing a cleric in a dream expresses the wisdom and patience that the dreamer has over the adversities and worries that befall him. He is a good person who is loved and appreciated by the people around him. Whereas anyone who sees in his dream that he has become a religious person teaches people knowledge, but it is not Knowing in reality, this indicates that there are many problems that he will face in the coming period of his life. Seeing a righteous man in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in his dream a religious man talking to him and conversing with him about a matter, then his vision warns him of it because he has committed Transgression and transgressions. It made him angry. Whoever sees in a dream a righteous religious man giving him water to drink, then seeing him is a sign of his piety, and that he is a good believer who has a great status in this world and the hereafter. And if he gives him wine to drink, then this is also a praiseworthy matter that the dreamer will receive a lot in the afterlife as a reward for good deeds. Which he does in this world. Also, seeing a religious man giving the dreamer milk, this indicates the good heart of the dreamer, the purity of the soul, and his desire to do good deeds to gain the satisfaction of God Almighty. And whoever dreams in a dream that he kisses a religious man, this indicates a good omen. To him, God will keep away from him all evil and evil from those who intended to harm him, which is a praiseworthy vision that indicates goodness. The qualities of the dreamer and his good reputation among the people, so they respect him and place him among many. And when you see in his dream a well-known religious man, and in reality he was old, but he came to him in the form of a young man, then it is a good vision that promises him the acquisition of a lot of goodness and money. And we enjoy

title: Interpretation of seeing my ex-boyfriend and talking to him in our house about Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my ex-boyfriend and talking to him in our house about Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of dreams is a series of fantasies that come to a person’s mind during his sleep. Some of these dreams are true, and some are unclear and do not need interpretation. The vision may be from God Almighty, which heralds. Good for the individual, it can also be an unpleasant vision. According to what interpreters do, as psychologists have explained, dreams are very beneficial to humans in terms of health and that they activate the mind, and thus the mind remains active until it wakes up, then we will learn about the interpretation of seeing my ex-boyfriend and the discussion with him in our house on the authority of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of seeing my ex-boyfriend in a dream. An ex-lover in a dream is an unpleasant vision, in which the person’s opinion suffers from many problems, and this narrative indicates many obstacles in daily life, and it also has many connotations, depending on the condition of the person who sees it, but there are some cases that indicate goodness, And that this vision is beneficial to the person and her happiness, and we will explain it in detail in this article. Seeing my ex-boyfriend and talking to him in our house about Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned many interpretations in this dream that depend on the person’s condition. He also said that seeing an ex-lover is not desirable at all and that this is a warning and that there are many problems that will accompany this person. Among the most important interpretations are also the following: Seeing a former lover is nothing but an influence, mental activity, and excessive thinking, in addition to longing and desire to return to the lover. He explained that this vision contains many problems and obstacles that will appear to a person from among his family members, but if a married woman sees Therefore, this is an rejected vision, which indicates the extent of the difficulties that you will face. What is the interpretation of the vision that my ex-boyfriend is single? Many of those interested in interpreting dreams, the most famous of whom are Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, also interpreted many dreams and published them in their works, which clarify and explain this vision, including: That's my favorite interpretation of the previous vision. Single women: If an unmarried girl sees her ex-boyfriend in a dream, this indicates that she thinks about him a lot. The vision may also indicate that the unmarried girl is approaching marriage in the near future, whether it is from this person or from someone else. If she talks to him , it indicates that she deeply regrets something she did in the past. Whereas if he is seen attached to another person, this indicates dissatisfaction and agreement between them. Seeing an unmarried girl may indicate her intense longing for her former lover and his desire to return to him, which indicates his return To him again. Also, this opinion is undesirable. It symbolizes the beginning of a new life for the girl, which indicates her engagement soon. What is the meaning of seeing an ex-lover in a dream for the fiancée? If the fiancée sees her ex-lover in a dream and that she is in a state of joy and the like, and that she Engaged to another man, this interpretation indicates a lack of happiness, as well as a lack of satisfaction, and that she will face it. Many problems with her family in the next few days confirmed that Muhammad b

title: More than 120 interpretations of a dream about a lemon tree according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What did the jurists say about the interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree in a dream? If you dreamed about a lemon tree and mixed up the interpretation of this dream through the specialized Egyptian website, many meanings and results of this vision will become clear, in addition to mentioning the interpretations of the most famous jurists such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others, or for a woman. Interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree In a dream, seeing a lemon tree in a dream shows a woman who has a lot of money and possessions. Perhaps seeing this symbol indicates that the dreamer will soon become wealthy and become famous among people for her generosity and love to help them financially. This symbol indicates a man known for piety and uprightness in the dreamer’s life, and this sign is divided into Four other signs: Whether or not: If an unmarried woman dreams of a lemon tree, this represents her father’s material and moral assistance to her and this great love that he gives her in her life helps her achieve many of her future goals and aspirations. Second: The same symbol can indicate in a girl’s dream To a religious young man who seeks to marry her and will be the ideal husband in the future. Third: If she is a widow, this symbol is interpreted to refer to her father, brother, or son, and if her father is deceased and has no brothers or male children, then the dream indicates the presence of a friend or a wise man who supports her. . Her advice is to live her life quietly. Fourth: When a divorced woman sees this tree, she is about to marry a man whose character is full of good qualities such as generosity, courage, and status. What is the interpretation of the lemon tree according to its condition in the dream? This means that this tree may appear to be full of withered or immature fruit, Sometimes the dreamer sees a small and a large tree, and these distinctive symbols should not be neglected in dreams. If the dream sees that the lemons filling the tree are immature and need patience to ripen and be ready for use, this means that the dreamer will begin preparing a project or a small business deal, and from him you will need Time and effort to reap material gains. If the dreamer sees this tree full of dried lemons, the dream indicates his association with an opinion that reaches stubbornness, and unfortunately, the stricter a person is on the spiritual level, the greater his losses because life needs a flexible person. In continuation of the previous dream, it appears That the dreamer is characterized by neglect and indifference, and this lethargy takes various forms as follows: Or not: The dreamer may ignore his relationship with Almighty God, neglect prayer and other religious controls, and seek to accumulate as much false worldly good as possible. Second: This dream means that the dreamer does not He performs his work to the best of his ability, and that indifference will make him a victim of job failure and then he will fail financially because work and money are closely linked. Third: If a man sees a dried lemon, then he is ignoring the rights of his wife and children, and God has sent him this vision to take care of them and be a source of safety and support for them. What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about lemons in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree by Ibn Sirini. The dream interprets that the dreamer is a supportive person who seeks to alleviate his worries and pay off his debts. The more the fruits of this tree are.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blind person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Whoever sees a blind person in a dream indicates wealth and obtaining an inheritance, and other interpretations, we explain it to the girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, such as: dreaming of blindness for a close person, or I saw my blind sister, or I saw a blind girl, or I help a blind person, or I marry a blind person or someone I know became blind with Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn. Sirin and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a blind man in a dream All dreams of blindness carry contradictory meanings at the same time, as they indicate earning a living and inheritance, and at the same time indicate a person’s departure from his religion and so on. It indicates the vision of a blind man in a dream that the fortune teller will live for a period of time with one of his relatives who lived far away and will be able to find good solutions to all the situations and events that he faced in his life and that affected him negatively. In addition to this vision, the blind man in a dream means that the owner of the dream will meet people with bad morals and characteristics, and they will treat him with foolish and disrespectful behavior. Seeing a blind person in a dream interprets this vision with many different interpretations, as it indicates the possibility that the dreamer will fall into poverty and lose all his wealth and money and be exposed to very bad situations. Sometimes it indicates a lack of religion and faith and the loss of principles and values. Taking the hand of a blind person in a dream and helping him indicates good morals that have a lot of mercy and compassion. Never sitting with a blind person in a dream indicates that this person treats the poor and needy well and seeing talking to a blind person In a dream, it appears that the dreamer will be exposed to great harm. When you take or take money from a blind man in a dream, it indicates exposure to hardship or extreme poverty or obtaining money from forbidden sources. Seeing a blind man in a dream indicates the presence of a well-intentioned person who treats the people around him with affection and mercy and prefers this treatment and these morals in his dealings. The blind man in a dream shows the injustice of insight in his actions and dealings in general, and because of his interference in matters with bias in situations and people, his judgments will be unfair or unfair to everyone and will cause some harm and distress. , but he will pay a heavy price. Seeing a blind person in a dream also indicates seeing the wrong or evil, and being silent and not making a sound or denying it until the end. There are also completely different interpretations, so this vision can be interpreted as promising goodness and blessing and indicates that the person will get a share or a good amount of money from his father's money or from a certain partnership as indicated by the vision of a blind man in a dream, which means that the visionary must continue to work until he improves and realizes a happy and comfortable life. Seeing a blind person in a dream, this vision shows evil, misery, facing difficulties, obstacles and obstacles of opinion in an unusual way, and it can be interpreted completely differently as the flowers of life, and the improvement of great material and financial matters. He gains. Seeing a blind person indicates his awareness of his reputation and high position in society as a whole, and the person will be highly appreciated in the eyes of everyone around him. Seeing a blind person in a dream indicates that he is aware of his reputation and high position in society as a whole, and the person will be highly regarded ...

title: Interpretation of seeing a cup of coffee in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a cup of coffee for a single woman in a dream I have seen manycups of coffee is a happy sign, conveying joy, pleasure and communication with a special person. The dream portends joy for the girl soon and God knows best. title: Seeing gold in a dream for a man

preview.html: Therefore, we will explain together what it means to see gold in a dream for a man, and this is done through this article and our website is interpreted, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees gold in her dream, this indicates goodness and happiness that will come to her soon, Because gold for an unmarried woman is a great advantage for her. It bodes well for the future happiness that she will have with her life partner and family in the future, and she will be a good husband, God willing. We find that the interpretation of her dream varies depending on the form of gold, so we give an example if she sees in her dream that she is wearing a crown Golden. This indicates that her marriage is approaching, and that a respectable man will propose and marry her. If someone she knows gives her a golden crown, this means that he will propose to her. As for her seeing small feet of gold, this indicates that something limits and limits her freedom. It is also an indication of Controlled fear and anxiety, which she needs to get rid of. It also explains the psychological distress that has hampered her life. An unmarried girl wearing a gold bracelet in a dream is interpreted as being restricted by a large number of restrictions. He has a lot of burdens and obligations and perhaps an indication that he will get married soon The dream in which an unmarried girl wears a golden necklace indicates the presence of a trust entrusted to her, and she fears losing it or losing it. As for the golden ring, its meanings are different and indicate some things that isolate her from living a normal and peaceful life. This is behind her heavy burdens related to her home and family, and it could be It also interprets the cancellation of the engagement or the end of the relationship. Another type of gold, the golden belt, is interpreted as a heavy burden that she carries alone and with it she feels tired and suffering. As for the golden earring, a single woman wears it in a dream. It indicates her instability in her marriage, if it is lost in the vision, Evidence of the difference between them. See also: Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of gold pieces. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who wears gold in a dream is a sign of happiness and comfort, because she can provide for her family’s needs. She also lives happily with her husband without any problems. Also, it is The interpretation of this dream is due to achieving her dreams and goals. This happens because some married women are worried, on the one hand, about their inability to complete their lives happily and stably. It also indicates that a married woman is wearing gold in her dream of great wealth that will come to her, or that she is waiting for a child and is eager to Seeing it. In this case, the married woman feels fear, but interpretation scholars have explained that repeating the dream or frequently dreaming about gold is a sign of joy in pregnancy. In some other interpretations, seeing gold in a dream indicates the imminent marriage of one of her children or one of her friends. Seeing gold in a dream is not related to Not only what concerns her, but also extends to her children, their marriage, or their friends who have a strong relationship with her. Also, seeing gold in a dream means wealth and earning a lot of money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a father’s death and his return to life

preview.html: We will see in this article from our website a clear interpretation of this vision from the point of view of some scholars, and in the case of single and married women, young men, men and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing the father’s death and his return to life in a dream for an unmarried girl. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream that her father died and then came back to life is a confusing vision. This may indicate that she will have a share in the date of her next wedding in the coming period. Or that this girl will meet in her life a happy period in reality. This vision in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the girl will receive a great deal of sustenance, blessings, and kindness. He believes Some scholars consider this dream praiseworthy, because it indicates the girl’s long life. As for the father returning in the dream of an unmarried woman and then taking something from her, this indicates the problems and difficulties that will come. It may indicate the beginning of a new bright life for the dreaming girl. See also : Visiting the father’s grave in a dream. Interpretation of the father’s death and his return to life in a dream for a married woman. There are different interpretations of this vision in a married woman’s dream: In the event that a married woman sees that her father died in a dream and his life returned. The vision indicates that the wife will move into the house with a new one. Also, in In the coming period, she will rebuild the house in which she lives. Scientists interpret this vision to symbolize a lot of goodness and blessings, or that her life with her husband is a promising beginning of goodness and happiness. As for the dream of a married woman who cries for her dead father in a dream, this means prosperity and life. Kindness. As for a married woman who sees comfort in a dream, this means that the married woman has many faults and sins. Washing the deceased father in a dream for a married woman means good livelihood and sustenance. The interpretation of seeing the father’s death and his return to life in a man’s dream and its meaning. This vision differs in a man’s dream. One of its most important interpretations is: When you see a father in a dream, the man has died and then comes back to life. The vision indicated that he will get rid of his worries and problems that he faces in reality. Some interpreters believe that this vision shows the financial loss to which the dreamer is exposed. Just as someone dies. Members of his family, and God knows best. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, he will be cured, God willing. Crying for a deceased father in a dream in a Bedouin’s dream is a sign that his fears have ended in reality. A man seeing in his dream that his father died, and in reality there was a quarrel between them The vision showed that there is a secret between them and this secret will be revealed. The vision warns the man to change his situation for the better in the field of work and family. Read also: Seeing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing the father’s death and his return to life in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Likewise, the dream of a father’s death in a dream and his return To life again in a pregnant woman’s dream means many indications of good visions as well. The vision also indicates that the pregnant woman will give birth to a new baby of its kind, a male, God willing, and the baby will be a just and righteous boy. Many scholars also believe that the vision indicates ease of birth. It symbolizes

title: Interpretation of buying a watch in a dream

preview.html: When a watch appears in a dream, it causes a group of people to search in many different places to interpret this vision, and from here we will learn about the interpretation of buying a watch in a dream.Interpretation of seeing a watch in a dreamIf the dreamer sees that he bought a watch in a dream but it broke or It was damaged during the dream. This vision means that this person will be exposed to a group of uncontrollable events in his life. Which he will try hard to get rid of as quickly as possible. Either the dreamer will see in his sleep that he bought a wristwatch and its shape was very wonderful and attractive. This vision indicates that the dreamer was able to achieve a large number of dreams that he kept dreaming about in the previous days of his life. About seeing a watch bought by a very close friend while the dreamer was sleeping. This vision indicates that this friend who appeared to him during the vision will One of the most loyal people that the dreamer has met in his entire life. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he bought a wristwatch from a famous store. Evidence that this person has moved from living in a popular place to a very luxurious place. He will be able to form very broad friendships that will allow him to With many things. See also: Interpretation of seeing a watch in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing buying a watch in a dream for a single girl. There are many well-known dream interpreters who reported seeing buying a watch in a dream for a single girl in general. This is evidence that this girl is very serious about marriage, as There are those around her who are trying to convince her a lot, and she knows this very well. About an unmarried girl seeing during her sleep that she is buying a watch and the color of this watch is gold. They are from a group of dreams that indicate that this girl will marry a well-to-do man and that this man will take her to a different level. Exactly about the level in which you live. In the case of buying a silver watch for a sleeping girl. This vision means that this girl is in a very close relationship. And this step will make her feel very happy and make her confident in herself. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying a watch A hand, to give it as a gift to someone you know in a dream. This vision indicates that this girl will obtain multiple benefits from the person who appeared to her in a dream and that this person intends nothing but good for her. Interpretation of seeing buying a watch in a dream for a married woman. About a married woman who sees herself buying A wristwatch with her husband and she feels very happy in a dream. This vision shows the extent of cooperation in everything between this woman and her husband. This partnership creates a general atmosphere of love, interdependence, and wonderful romance between them. As for the married woman who sees in her sleep that she is buying a large wristwatch, she does not It is proportional to the nature of her body size. This vision means that this woman has gone through some financial difficulties. But soon she will get rid of this difficult period, and this will be just a test from Almighty God for her. If a married woman sees that she is buying a watch, she will give it to her husband during her sleep. It is one of the dreams Which shows how jealous this woman is of me
